description: Simply ask Alexa for an idea from Giant Spoon and then sit back and get ready to become an elite marketing guru. Giant Spoon is a marketing strategy, communications planning, and innovation company that has more ideas than you can shake a stick at. That said, we appreciate you not shaking sticks at our ideas.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Giant Spoon for an idea
Alexa, ask Giant Spoon for help brainstorming
Alexa, ask Giant Spoon for advice
name: Giant Spoon
shortDescription: The world class Giant Spoon app allows you to ask for world class marketing ideas from world class marketing agency Giant Spoon.
